TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SemanticResultKey extends System.Object

summary.span: 将密匙字符串与 值关联，以定义 对象。

span.span: Associates a key string with values to define objects.

related.span: 使用 SemanticResultKey 提取 SemanticResultValue

span.span: Using a SemanticResultKey to Extract a SemanticResultValue

summary.span: 构造一个 实例并将项与语法组件关联。

span.span: Constructs an instance of and associates the key with grammar components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的构造函数指定要添加到语音识别语法的文本标记 (语义密钥) 和语法组件集。The constructors for specify a text tag (the semantic key) and a set of grammar components to add to a speech recognition grammar. 语法组件可以指定为对象的数组, 也可以指定为实例的数组。The grammar components can be specified either as an array of objects, or as an array of instances. 如果语法组件用于识别, 则可以使用提供给构造函数的 文本标记将返回的作为语义键。If the grammar components are used in recognition, you can access the returned using the text tag provided to the constructor of as a semantic key. 实例的属性将由的定义中使用的语法组件确定。The property of the instance will be determined by the grammar components used in the definition of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string semanticResultKey, class System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder[] builders) cil managed
Public Sub New (semanticResultKey As String, ParamArray builders As GrammarBuilder())

param.name: semanticResultKey
param.span: 要用于作为语义关键访问 与参数指定的对象 关联的实例 的标记。

span.span: The tag to be used as a semantic key to access the instance associated with the objects specified by the argument.

param.name: builders
param.span: 将与可用 中定义的标记访问的 对象相关联的语法组件的数组。

span.span: An array of grammar components that will be associated with a object accessible with the tag defined in .

summary.span: 分配一个语义密匙给一个或多个 对象，用于创建语音识别语法。

span.span: Assigns a semantic key to one or more objects used to create a speech recognition grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: public SemanticResultKey (string semanticResultKey, params string[] phrases);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string semanticResultKey, string[] phrases) cil managed
Public Sub New (semanticResultKey As String, ParamArray phrases As String())

param.name: semanticResultKey
param.span: 要用于访问与由 参数指定的对象 相关联的 实例的标记。

span.span: The tag to be used access the instance associated with the objects specified by the argument.

param.name: phrases
param.span: 一个或多个 对象，其连接文本将与使用定义在 标记可访问的 对象关联。

span.span: One or more objects, whose concatenated text will be associated with a object accessible with the tag defined in .

summary.span: 分配一个语义密匙给一个或多个 实例，用于创建语音识别语法。

span.span: Assigns a semantic key to one or more instances used to create a speech recognition grammar.

summary.span: 从 实例返回 结构的实例。
